'''''It's Fish, I Added Fish''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] [[Poissonous Cuisine]].
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
*
-->
==Trivia==
* The name of this Achievement is a reference to the 1996 Hong Kong Movie ''God of Cookery'' by Stephen Chow. In that movie, during a cooking contest, when asked about why a dish brings the referees to tears, the contestant replied, "It's onions, I added onions."
